About the Proprietor

Mr. Ajay Patil is the proud proprietor of RMGS, bringing over 15 years of hands-on experience in the automobile service industry. Known for his dedication, honesty, and technical expertise, Mr. Patil has built RMGS into Pune’s most trusted mobile garage service. He is passionate about helping stranded motorists and is always just a call away for emergencies.
"Your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities!"
